channel.title: Mining Issue - Donator Benefits - Please Help!

item.title: Mining Issue - Donator Benefits - Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.source: Mining Issue - Donator Benefits - Please Help!

item.title: Mining Issue - Donator Benefits - Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

[code]if

(giveGem) {

boolean onyx = (o == Ores.Runite || o == Ores.CRASHED_STAR) &&

Misc.getRandom(o == Ores.CRASHED_STAR ? 20000 : 5000) == 1;

if(onyx || Misc.getRandom(o == Ores.CRASHED_STAR ? 35 : 50) == 15) {

int gemId = onyx ? 6571 : MiningData.RANDOM_GEMS[(int)

(MiningData.RANDOM_GEMS.length * Math.random())];

player.getInventory().add(gemId, 1);

player.getPacketSender().sendMessage(“You’ve found a gem!”);

if(gemId == 6571) {

String s = o == Ores.Runite ? "Runite ore" : "Crashed star";
									

World.sendMessage("<img=10><col=009966> "+player.getUsername()+"

has just received an Uncut Onyx from mining a “+s+”!");

}else if (giveGem && player.getRights() == PlayerRights.BRONZE_MEMBER ||

player.getRights() == PlayerRights.SILVER_MEMBER || player.getRights() ==

PlayerRights.GOLD_MEMBER || player.getRights() ==

PlayerRights.PLATINUM_MEMBER || player.getRights() ==

PlayerRights.DIAMOND_MEMBER) {

boolean onyx = (o == Ores.Runite || o == Ores.CRASHED_STAR) &&

Misc.getRandom(o == Ores.CRASHED_STAR ? 20000 : 5000) == 1;

if(onyx || Misc.getRandom(o == Ores.CRASHED_STAR ? 35 : 50) == 15) {

int gemId = onyx ? 6571 : MiningData.RANDOM_GEMS[(int)

(MiningData.RANDOM_GEMS.length * Math.random())];

player.getInventory().add(gemId, 2);

player.getPacketSender().sendMessage("You’ve found a gem, but as a

donator, you get two!");

}

								}
							} [/code]

I’m trying to add a donator benefit where if one is any of the ranks listed, they get 2 gems instead of 1. For some reason, it’s not working. Can someone please explain to me how to fix this? The errors when compiling is posted below…

[code]src\com\ruseps\world\content\skill\impl\mining\Mining.java:130: error: illegal s
tart of type
